alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 12:10PM EST until March 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts around 45 mph. * WHERE...In Delaware, Delaware Beaches. In New Jersey, Atlantic Coastal Cape May and Coastal Atlantic. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic
